investigative-fund-2025.title: Investigative Journalism Fund 2025
investigative-fund-2025.summary: A dedicated fund to support in-depth reporting on public accountability, corruption, and service delivery.
investigative-fund-2025.description: This fund is designed to support journalists who wish to undertake deep-dive investigative projects that go beyond daily reporting. We are looking for stories that hold power to account, expose wrongdoing, and shine a light on systemic issues affecting Tanzanian citizens.
eligibility: Must be a Tanzanian journalist (freelance or employed).
Must have at least 3 years of reporting experience.
Must provide a letter of support from an editor/media house.
